long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will modify the GlobeNewsWire website to scroll infinitely. GlobeNewsWire is a site for investor news, but doesn't give an option for displaying more than 10 news results per page. This extension will help investors save time by displaying more results as they scroll. Get an access code here: https://gumroad.com/l/qpcbE
